channel.title: Comments on: The Shy, Lonely and Vulnerable Dr. C

item.title: By: celerie
item.dc:creator: celerie
item.description: <blockquote>I can't tell you how sick I am of guildmates making serious accusations against guildmates, then refusing to name the offenders cuz that's being a tattletale. Jesus, man up and point your finger, otherwise don't bother me.</blockquote> ffs, i know exactly what you mean. so frustrating. makes matters worse when it's another fricking officer doing it. ugh.
item.content:encoded:
I can’t tell you how sick I am of guildmates making serious accusations against guildmates, then refusing to name the offenders cuz that’s being a tattletale. Jesus, man up and point your finger, otherwise don’t bother me.

ffs, i know exactly what you mean. so frustrating. makes matters worse when it’s another fricking officer doing it. ugh.

item.title: By: Aufero
item.dc:creator: Aufero
item.description: No amount of psych screening will weed out the crazies. When there's no guild drama, crazies spontaneously develop to fill the vacuum.
item.content:encoded: No amount of psych screening will weed out the crazies. When there’s no guild drama, crazies spontaneously develop to fill the vacuum.

item.title: By: Paul
item.dc:creator: Paul
item.description: Holy crap. Do you guys have a psychological screening when you recruit people into your guild? Because it looks like you're only picking the freaky people. Nonetheless, awesome story. I require more!
item.content:encoded: Holy crap. Do you guys have a psychological screening when you recruit people into your guild? Because it looks like you’re only picking the freaky people. Nonetheless, awesome story. I require more!

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: lol--as always, thanks for the hysterical stories.
item.content:encoded: lol–as always, thanks for the hysterical stories.

item.title: By: Jay
item.dc:creator: Jay
item.description:
I switched to an RP server recently and rolled a BE pally, and the guild I'm in are mostly RL friends and coworkers. If there's any guild drama, I hope they bring it to work. That'd be really entertaining. ;) I really want to punish them for asking me to move to a fucking RP server. Any ideas?
On topic... Funny how some people just play drama-queen when the shit hits the fan. Dr. C just didn't want to own up to what he'd done. That makes him a pussy and coward in my book.
item.content:encoded:
I switched to an RP server recently and rolled a BE pally, and the guild I’m in are mostly RL friends and coworkers. If there’s any guild drama, I hope they bring it to work. That’d be really entertaining. üòâ I really want to punish them for asking me to move to a fucking RP server. Any ideas?

On topic… Funny how some people just play drama-queen when the shit hits the fan. Dr. C just didn’t want to own up to what he’d done. That makes him a pussy and coward in my book.

item.title: By: Twistlers
item.dc:creator: Twistlers
item.description: reading these stories makes me want to join a PvE based guild, just to see if the same amount of drama goes on...then i remember that i'd end up being thrown into it as well, so i'll stick to watching from the nosebleeds. front row seats will get some of that shit from the fan dontchaknow :(
item.content:encoded: reading these stories makes me want to join a PvE based guild, just to see if the same amount of drama goes on…then i remember that i’d end up being thrown into it as well, so i’ll stick to watching from the nosebleeds. front row seats will get some of that shit from the fan dontchaknow üôÅ

item.title: By: Mars506
item.dc:creator: Mars506
item.description:
I was really looking forward to this story (Part III), thinkin' there was gonna be some spectacular climax with BabbleOn. Although I'm kinda disappointed, I guess its for the better that you have less drama to deal with. Less QQ is always a good thing.
Oh and I'm a frequent reader. Keep up the awesome posts. ; )
item.content:encoded:
I was really looking forward to this story (Part III), thinkin’ there was gonna be some spectacular climax with BabbleOn. Although I’m kinda disappointed, I guess its for the better that you have less drama to deal with. Less QQ is always a good thing.

Oh and I’m a frequent reader. Keep up the awesome posts. ; )

item.title: By: Nereus
item.dc:creator: Nereus
item.description:
Your stories never cease to entertain :)
Also makes me very glad I gave up my raiding guild and just play with my RL friends nowadays in arena and pvp
item.content:encoded:

item.description: Oh my... you certainly get the choice ones passing through your guild.... Great story.
